ygData.subject: RE: Charm song...
ygData.msgSnippet: Can you (one) make more hot keys than you have socials?  Is there a point where you run out of socials to customize? I have made a bunch and they seem to be
ygData.messageBody:
Can you (one) make more hot keys than you have socials? Is there a point
where you run out of socials to customize?

I have made a bunch and they seem to be limited to the number of socials
that can be displayed in the socials screen. Or is there a way to make more
of them?

With new pet commands, I am worried I am gonna run out of socials to
customize.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 27th-1 song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk
